name: Rambo: The Video Game
description:
Rambo: The Video Game is an action-shooter game developed by Teyon. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Reef Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Rambo: The Video Game is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
Mariusz Sajak and Piotr Latocha produced the game. It was directed by Craig Lewis and Will Curley. Jakub Gawlina scored the game.
